overview: The vigour and freshness personified. Amazing boys with their testosterone ready to explode cannot retain their intense sexual pulsations. They seek, provoke and attract each other mutually in the most mysterious places in the middle of a torrid summer. Romanticism in Normandie, white-sand beach and a luxury hotel passing by the smell of the fresh cut lawn of a villa from the north to end up by the boards of the Canal de Bourgogne under the heat of summer. All these young vigorous bodies caress and penetrate each other with delight in groups of two or more leaving free their joy. Few dialogues because the images speak for themselves. Very pure Cadinot, natural and spontaneous. Vacations that we would love to live each summer more and more
title: Coup de soleil
